title: Support Widows in Need
description: We have tags for Widow, and Widower, and we have deacon assignments.  But only some of the widows would have a deacon assignment.  But we also would want to trace the needs of our widows, even if our men may not be the right people to contact them.  The summary page works only off of assignments, so it isn't quite the right model for Widows in Need.  Will probably start with combining the Widow and Long Term Needs and Shut-In tags to generate a Summary list.

title: Greyed out and cannot submit contact on iPhone 8
Create server-side contact form route
description: Create POST handler for /form/record-contact. Parse form data (memberId[], deaconId[], contactType, summary, contactDate, householdId). Use verifyRole(c, ['deacon', 'staff']). Make internal call to existing POST /api/contacts endpoint to create the contact. On success (200/201), redirect to /household.html?id={householdId}. On failure, return user-friendly error page with error message.

title: Register contact form routes in api.js
description: Import registerContactFormRoutes from src/form/contact-form.js and call it in createApp(). Ensure routes are registered after authentication middleware.

title: Convert record-contact.html to traditional POST
description: Replace JavaScript fetch submission with form action='/form/record-contact' method='POST'. Keep JavaScript only for page loading and dynamic content. Remove submit event handler. Ensure householdId is included as hidden field.

title: Fix Array.from polyfill placement
description: Move Array.from polyfill from inline script to the very top of <head> tag to ensure it loads before any code that needs it, fixing potential iPhone 8 compatibility issues.

title: Test form POST on iPhone 8
description: Verify the form POST works with existing cookie-based authentication from email-login.js. Test validation, redirect flow, and error handling. Test on iPhone 8 Safari if available.

title: Update auth middleware to allow /form/* routes
description: Modify email-login.js line 47 to allow /form/* paths through to next() so authenticated POST requests work. Add: if(c.req.path.startsWith('/form')) { return await next(); }
